channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2024030843
item.description:
Report X-2024030843

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-12
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered at unload leaking. After opening the cans were dented at their tops and whit paint leaking out. can did have paint clips DescribePack: top of cans dented DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in plastic bin with orientation arrows up
